function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of zoonotic pathogens from urban rats to humans","Impact":"Spread of zoonotic diseases and potential public health crisis","Mitigation":"Implementing effective rat control measures and public health education","Technologies":"Rat control technologies, public health interventions, and zoonotic disease surveillance","People":"Urban residents, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, municipal authorities"},{"Description":"Overpopulation of urban rats","Impact":"Damage to property, spread of rat allergens, and transmission of diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing rat population control measures and habitat modification","Technologies":"Rat population control technologies, habitat modification techniques","People":"Urban residents, pest control authorities","Owner":"Pest control authorities, local government"},{"Description":"Tick-borne disease prevalence in white-footed mice","Impact":"Risk of tick-borne diseases in humans","Mitigation":"Implementing transmission-blocking vaccines and targeted solutions to decrease disease prevalence in potential host reservoirs","Technologies":"Transmission-blocking vaccines, targeted disease prevalence reduction measures","People":"Researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities"}]}
